title: Axes Props
description: In this lab, you will learn how to customize the axis tick and grid properties in a Matplotlib plot using Python. Matplotlib is a data visualization library in Python that allows you to create a variety of charts and graphs. In this lab, we will focus on customizing the axis tick and grid properties of a line plot.
